#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#include<algorithm>
#include<vector>
#include<queue>
#define REP(i,n) for(i=0;i<n;i++)
#define sll(n) scanf("%lld",&n)
#define si(n) scanf("%d",&n)
#define pi(n) printf("%d",n)
#define sl(n) scanf("%ld",&n)
#define pin(n) printf("%d\n",n)
#define MP make_pair
#define PB push_back
typedef long long LL;
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    //long long a[3005];
    while(t--)
    {
        long long  n,m,i,k;
       string a,b,c,d;
        cin>>a;
        cin>>b;
       
		c=a;
	
        //int g=a.length();
        //int h=b.length();
        sort(c.begin(),c.end());
        int f=c.size();
        for(i=0;i<f;i++)
        {
        	k=i;
        	//cout<<c[k]<<endl;
        	while((c[k]-48)==0)
        	{
        		k++;
        		continue;
        	}
        	if((c[k]-48)!=0)
        	swap(c[k],c[i]);
        	break;
        }
        //cout<<c<<endl;
       if(c==b)
       {
       	cout<<"AC"<<endl;
       }
       else
   {
   	 cout<<"WA"<<endl;
   }
        
        
        
        
        
        
        
        
        
        
        
        
        
        
        
    }
	return 0;
}
